languages.text: {n}Экран когитатора мигает, словно система страдает от перебоев энергии. Коснувшись элементов управления, вы отдергиваете руку: устройство вымазано в чем-то вязком.{/n}

{n}The cogitator screen flickers as if the system is suffering a power failure. You reach out and touch the control panel but quickly jerk your hand back: the device is coated in some sticky substance.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Экран когитатора мигает, словно система страдает от перебоев энергии. Коснувшись элементов управления, вы отдергиваете руку: устройство вымазано в чем-то вязком.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}The cogitator screen is blinking, as if the system was suffering from a power failure. You reach out and touch the control panel but quickly jerk off your hand: the device is covered in something sticky.{/n}

{n}The cogitator screen is blinking, as if the system was suffering from a power failure. You reach out and touch the control panel but quickly jerk off your hand: the device is covered in something sticky.{/n}

{n}The cogitator screen flickers as if the system is suffering a power failure. You reach out and touch the control panel but quickly jerk your hand back: the device is coated in some sticky substance.{/n}

{n}The cogitator screen flickers as if the system is suffering a power failure. You reach out and touch the control panel but quickly jerk your hand back: the device is coated in some sticky substance.{/n}

{n}The cogitator screen flickers as if the system is suffering a power failure. You reach out and touch the control panel but quickly jerk your hand back: the device is coated in some sticky substance.{/n}

languages.text: {n}沉思者的屏幕闪烁着，仿佛系统电源发生了故障。你打算伸手触碰控制面板，但随后就立刻把手缩了回去——这台设备上涂着某种黏性物质。{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}The cogitator screen flickers as if the system is suffering a power failure. You reach out and touch the control panel but quickly jerk your hand back: the device is coated in some sticky substance.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}思考器的屏幕闪烁着，仿佛系统电源发生了故障。你打算伸手触碰控制面板，但随后就立刻把手缩了回去——这台设备上涂着某种黏性物质。{/n}

languages.text: {n}La pantalla del cogitador parpadea como si al sistema le faltara energía. Alargas la mano hacia el panel pero pronto la apartas: el dispositivo está cubierto de una sustancia pegajosa.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}The cogitator screen flickers as if the system is suffering a power failure. You reach out and touch the control panel but quickly jerk your hand back: the device is coated in some sticky substance.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}La pantalla del cogitador parpadea como si al sistema le faltara energía. Alargas la mano hacia el panel pero pronto la apartas: el dispositivo está cubierto de una sustancia pegajosa.{/n}

languages.text: {n}システムが停電で苦しんでいるかのように、考算機の画面がちらつく。手を伸ばしてコントロールパネルに触れたが、すぐに手を引いた。装置は粘ついた物質で覆われている。{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}The cogitator screen flickers as if the system is suffering a power failure. You reach out and touch the control panel but quickly jerk your hand back: the device is coated in some sticky substance.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}システムが停電で苦しんでいるかのように、考算機の画面がちらつく。手を伸ばしてコントロールパネルに触れたが、すぐに手を引いた。装置は粘ついた物質で覆われている。{/n}

languages.text: {n}Der Cogitator-Bildschirm flackert, als habe das System einen Energieausfall. Du streckst die Hand aus und berührst das Bedienfeld, ziehst aber sofort wieder zurück: Das Gerät ist mit einer klebrigen Substanz bedeckt.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}The cogitator screen flickers as if the system is suffering a power failure. You reach out and touch the control panel but quickly jerk your hand back: the device is coated in some sticky substance.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Der Cogitator-Bildschirm flackert, als habe das System einen Energieausfall. Du streckst die Hand aus und berührst das Bedienfeld, ziehst aber sofort wieder zurück: Das Gerät ist mit einer klebrigen Substanz bedeckt.{/n}

languages.text: {n}L'écran du cogitateur clignote comme si l'alimentation électrique du système était instable. Vous touchez le panneau de contrôle, mais retirez immédiatement votre main en sentant que l'appareil est recouvert d'une étrange substance visqueuse.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}The cogitator screen flickers as if the system is suffering a power failure. You reach out and touch the control panel but quickly jerk your hand back: the device is coated in some sticky substance.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}L'écran du cogitateur clignote comme si l'alimentation électrique du système était instable. Vous touchez le panneau de contrôle, mais retirez immédiatement votre main en sentant que l'appareil est recouvert d'une étrange substance visqueuse.{/n}

languages.text: {n}Kavramsayarın ekranı titreşiyor. Sisteme yeterince güç gitmiyor gibi görünüyor. Uzanıp kontrol paneline dokunduğun gibi elini çekiyorsun. Cihazın üstünü yapış yapış bir maddeyle kaplanmış.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}The cogitator screen flickers as if the system is suffering a power failure. You reach out and touch the control panel but quickly jerk your hand back: the device is coated in some sticky substance.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Kavramsayarın ekranı titreşiyor. Sistem güç yetersizliğinden muzdarip gibi görünüyor. Uzanıp kontrol paneline dokunduğun gibi elini çekiyorsun, cihazın üstünü yapış yapış bir maddeyle kaplanmış.{/n}
